name: No Bear Circle
description:
No Bear Circle is a Virtual Reality game where you repair natural disasters on Earth with your ridiculous toolkit. Wipe away floods with cosmic paper towels, put a cork in active volcanoes, and hose down wildfires with your squirt gun all whilst taunted by a space witch. Can you prevent enough disasters to repair the earth in time? (Bears Not Included)
